Unable to save your preferences. Try to: No se pueden guardar sus preferencias. Intente deshabilitar cualquier antivirus
Key frames will show on the timeline. Yo: Los fotogramas clave se mostrarán en la línea de tiempo. Necesitas hacer zoom para verlos
Muted preview (exported file will not be: Vista previa silenciada (el archivo exportado no se verá afectado)
Unable to save project file: No se puede guardar el archivo del proyecto
You have no write access to the director: No tiene acceso de escritura al directorio de este archivo, seleccione un directorio de trabajo personalizado
Failed to merge files. Make sure they ar: No se pudieron combinar los archivos. Asegúrese de que todos tengan exactamente los mismos códecs
Will now cut at the nearest keyframe bef: Ahora cortará en el fotograma clave más cercano antes del punto de corte inicial deseado. Esto se recomienda para la mayoría de los archivos.
Will now cut at the exact position, but: Ahora cortará en la posición exacta, pero puede dejar una parte vacía al principio del archivo. Es posible que deba establecer el punto de corte unos fotogramas antes del siguiente fotograma clave para lograr un corte preciso
File not natively supported. Preview may: Archivo no compatible de forma nativa. Es posible que la vista previa no tenga audio o sea de baja calidad. Sin embargo, la exportación final no tendrá pérdidas con audio. Puede convertirlo desde el menú para una mejor vista previa con audio.
Unable to playback this file. Try to con: No se puede reproducir este archivo. Intente convertir a un formato compatible desde el menú
Are you sure you want to move the source: ¿Está seguro de que desea mover el archivo de origen a la papelera?
File has been moved to trash: El archivo se movió a la papelera
Unable to move source file to trash. Do: No se puede mover el archivo de origen a la papelera. ¿Quieres eliminarlo definitivamente?
File has been permanently deleted: El archivo se ha eliminado de forma permanente
Unable to export this file: No se puede exportar este archivo
Start time must be before end time: La hora de inicio debe ser anterior a la hora de finalización
No tracks selected for export: No se seleccionaron pistas para exportar
There is a known issue with cutting iPho: Existe un problema conocido al cortar videos HEVC de iPhone. Es posible que el archivo de salida no funcione en todos los reproductores.
Unprocessable streams were exported as s: Las transmisiones no procesables se exportaron como archivos separados.
¡Hecho! Nota: los puntos de corte pueden ser inexactos. Asegúrese de probar los archivos de salida en el reproductor/editor que desee antes de eliminar la fuente. Si la salida no se ve bien, consulte la página de AYUDA.
Failed to capture frame: No se pudo capturar el fotograma
Unable to playback rate right now: No se puede reproducir la velocidad no funciona correctamente
No segment to split. Please move cursor: No hay segmento para dividir. Mueva el cursor sobre el segmento que desea dividir
Failed to load segments: No se pudieron cargar los segmentos
Unable to determine file format: No se puede determinar el formato de archivo
The audio track is not supported. You ca: La pista de audio no es compatible. La puede convertir a un formato compatible desde el menú
This file does not have a valid duration: Este archivo no tiene una duración válida. Esto puede causar problemas. Puede intentar corregir la duración del archivo desde el menú Archivo
All streams have been extracted as separ: Todas las transmisiones se han extraído como archivos separados
Failed to extract all streams: Error al extraer todas las transmisiones
You need to open a media file first: Primero debe abrir un archivo multimedia
Failed to convert file. Try a different: No se pudo convertir el archivo. Prueba una conversión diferente
Are you sure you want to close the curre: ¿Está seguro de que desea cerrar el archivo actual?
Select files to batch convert to support: Seleccionar archivos para convertir por lotes a formato compatible
Batch converting to supported format: Conversión por lotes a formato compatible
Failed to batch convert to supported for: No se pudo convertir por lotes al formato compatible
Failed to fix file duration: No se pudo corregir la duración del archivo
Mute preview? (will not affect output): ¿Silenciar la vista previa? (no afectará la salida)
Timeline trackpad/wheel sensitivity: Trackpad de la línea de tiempo / sensibilidad de la rueda
Auto merge segments to one file after ex: Combinar segmentos automáticamente en un archivo después de la exportación
Set custom start time offset: Establecer hora de inicio personalizada compensada
Instead of video apparently starting at: Instead of video apparently starting at 0, you can offset by a specified value. This only applies to the preview inside LosslessCut and does not modify the file in any way. Useful for viewing/cutting videos according to timecodes)
Fast: Full quality remux (no audio), lik: Fast: Full quality remux (no audio), likely to fail
Fast: Full quality remux, likely to fail: Fast: Full quality remux, likely to fail
These options will let you convert files: These options will let you convert files to a format that is supported by the player. You can try different options and see which works with your file. Note that the conversion is for preview only. When you run an export, the output will still be lossless with full quality
YouTube video description\n00:00 Intro\n:
Descripción del video de YouTube
00:00 Introducción
00:01 Capítulo 2
00:00:02.123 Capítulo 3
Paste or type a YouTube chapters descrip: Paste or type a YouTube chapters description or textual chapter description
Where do you want to save output files?: Where do you want to save output files?
Where do you want to save output files? Make sure there is enough free space in this folder
You opened a new file. What do you want: You opened a new file. What do you want to do?
Open the file instead of the current one: Open the file instead of the current one
Include all tracks from the new file: Include all tracks from the new file
This file has embedded chapters. Do you: This file has embedded chapters. Do you want to import the chapters as cut-segments?
Divide timeline into a number of equal l: Divide timeline into a number of equal length segments
Please input a valid number of segments: Please input a valid number of segments
Divide timeline into a number of segment: Divide timeline into a number of segments with the specified length
Please input a valid duration. Example:: Please input a valid duration. Example: {{example}}
One or more rows does not have 3 columns: One or more rows does not have 3 columns
Invalid start or end value. Must contain: Invalid start or end value. Must contain a number of seconds
Preserve all MOV/MP4 metadata (e.g. EXIF: Preserve all MOV/MP4 metadata (e.g. EXIF, GPS position etc.) from source file? Note that some players have trouble playing back files where all metadata is preserved.
Defaults to same format as input file. Y: Defaults to same format as input file. You can losslessly change the file format (container) of the file with this option. Not all formats support all codecs. Matroska/MP4/MOV support the most common codecs. Sometimes it's even impossible to export to the same output format as input.
With \"keyframe cut\", we will cut at th: With "keyframe cut", we will cut at the nearest keyframe before the desired start cutpoint. This is recommended for most files. With "Normal cut" you may have to manually set the cutpoint a few frames before the next keyframe to achieve a precise cut
Not all formats support all track types,: Not all formats support all track types, and LosslessCut is unable to properly cut some track types, so you may have to sacrifice some tracks by disabling them in order to get correct result.
Shift timestamps to make them non-negati: Shift timestamps to make them non-negative. Also note that this affects only leading negative timestamps, and not non-monotonic negative timestamps.
Shift timestamps so that the first times: Shift timestamps so that the first timestamp is 0. (LosslessCut default)
Enables shifting when required by the ta: Enables shifting when required by the target format.
Merge {{segments}} cut segment to one fi: Merge {{segments}} cut segment to one file?
Depending on your specific file, you may: Depending on your specific file, you may have to try different options for best results.
We are on the last frame: We are on the last frame
Failed to find any prev frame: Failed to find any prev frame
We are on the first frame: We are on the first frame
Failed to find any prev keyframe: Failed to find any prev keyframe
We are on the first keyframe: We are on the first keyframe
Lossless cutting is not an exact science: Lossless cutting is not an exact science. For some codecs and files it just works. For others you may need to trial and error depending on the codec, keyframes etc to get the best cut.
For more help and issues, please go to:: For more help and issues, please go to:
Seek backward 1% of timeline at current: Seek backward 1% of timeline at current zoom
Seek forward 1% of timeline at current z: Seek forward 1% of timeline at current zoom
Mark in / cut start point for current se: Mark in / cut start point for current segment
Mark out / cut end point for current seg: Mark out / cut end point for current segment
Toggle zoom between 1x and a calculated: Toggle zoom between 1x and a calculated comfortable zoom level
Hover mouse over buttons in the main int: Hover mouse over buttons in the main interface to see which function they have
The last executed ffmpeg commands will s: The last executed ffmpeg commands will show up here after you run operations. You can copy them to clipboard and modify them to your needs before running on your command line.
<0>Note:</0> Keyframe cut and Merge cuts: <0>Note:</0> Keyframe cut and Merge cuts buttons have been moved to the export panel (press Export to see it.)
When you export, selected segments on th: When you export, selected segments on the timeline will be REMOVED - the surrounding areas will be KEPT
When you export, selected segments on the timeline will be KEPT - the surrounding areas will be REMOVED.
More than one file must be selected: More than one file must be selected
Please select files to be merged: Please select files to be merged
Please select files to be merged. The fi: Please select files to be merged. The files need to be of the exact same format and codecs
If this is checked, all audio/video/subt: If this is checked, all audio/video/subtitle/data tracks will be included. This may not always work for all file types. If not checked, only default streams will be included.
Make sure you have no overlapping segmen: Make sure you have no overlapping segments.
This is where working files, exported fi: This is where working files, exported files, project files (CSV) are stored.
Auto merge segments to one file during e: Auto merge segments to one file during export or export to separate files?
Choose cutting mode: Remove or keep sele: Choose cutting mode: Remove or keep selected segments from video when exporting?
The video inside segments will be kept,: The video inside segments will be kept, while the video outside will be discarded.
The video inside segments will be discar: The video inside segments will be discarded, while the video surrounding them will be kept.
Extract unprocessable tracks to separate: Extract unprocessable tracks to separate files or discard them?
(data tracks such as GoPro GPS, telemetr: (data tracks such as GoPro GPS, telemetry etc. are not copied over by default because ffmpeg cannot cut them, thus they will cause the media duration to stay the same after cutting video/audio)
The project will be stored along with th: The project will be stored along with the output files as a CSV file
Ask for confirmation when closing app or: Ask for confirmation when closing app or file?
Ask about importing chapters from opened: Ask about importing chapters from opened file?
Ask about what to do when opening a new: Ask about what to do when opening a new file when another file is already already open?
Click to select which tracks to keep whe: Click to select which tracks to keep when exporting:
When tracks have different lengths, do y: When tracks have different lengths, do you want to make the output file as long as the longest or the shortest track?
Discard or extract unprocessable tracks: Discard or extract unprocessable tracks to separate files?
Include more tracks from other file: Include more tracks from other file
Export each track as individual files: Export each track as individual files
Zoom in more to view waveform: Zoom in more to view waveform
Set cut start to current position: Set cut start to current position
Set cut end to current position: Set cut end to current position
